name: RPG Maker MV Encrypted PNG File
summary: Learn about .RPGMVP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When creating a game in RPG Maker MV, the user creates PNG image resources for different elements of the game. When the project is deployed, the images are encrypted and placed in the game directory:
The images are encrypted to protect against modification and are not meant to be manually opened. However, users can decrypt RPGMVP files using Petschkos RPG-Maker MV-File Decrypter.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
